title: Lauda vs Prost in 1985: The last time Zandvoort said goodbye
summary: 40 years ago the Dutch GP held its last F1 race, until the Verstappen phenomenon brought it back in 2021 â€“Matt Bishopremembers a fine contest between two grand prix legends

qa_pairs.question: Which two legendary drivers had a notable rivalry during the 1985 Dutch Grand Prix?
When did the Dutch Grand Prix officially return to the Formula 1 calendar after a long absence?
What significant event took place in Zandvoort in 1985 regarding the Formula 1 calendar?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It held its last F1 race until its return in 2021.
wrong_options: It was the first time F1 raced there
It hosted the final race of the season
It became a night race for the first time
